New in v1.2 (11 August 2015):
- pyfits dependency updated to astropy
- new GUI for data and image display
- scripts edited to be more pythonic, include example code for others' use
- exoCode subdir renamed src
- inclusion of (empty) folders for all included catalogs under FITS/ and Results/
- inclusion of documentation, also reached at 
   https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-QtbvASw43S03IHlEPk4qlstk8aNtAmu8uT2uNk6otY/edit?usp=sharing
